page.title: 16GRAVEL PRODUCTION:TEST VLY
page.content: We visited a gravel quarry of 40_50 acres on Broadlands Estate near to the river Test.There are a few variations of gravel types;there are different sizes of gravel.Some gravel comes from granite,but the granite in this area was formed from eluvial and flintstones,and may have originated from large rivers in the area during the Ice Age.There are few substitutes for gravel except fibre glass matting which is used with gravel not instead of it. Digging for gravel has gone on here for 100 years,although the present quarry was begun in 1956 and the newest part in April 1984.This area of the estate is almost work
